verbose_text: Th1, Th2, and iTreg cell differentiation, analyzed by signature cytokine and transcription factor expression levels, was dose-dependently inhibited by 2DG, ultimately resulting in cell death at concentrations above 1 mM (XREF_FIG A, 1B, and XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY A).
evidence: cell differentiation, analyzed by signature cytokine and transcription factor expression levels, was dose-dependently inhibited by 2DG, ultimately resulting in cell death
